name: Unfolding
description:
Unfolding is a text-based narrative game about meeting someone new in an unfortunate time.

The game explores the notion of authorship in games by letting the player act as the writer of a story that unfolds through grammars. The game uses a system we are currently developing, using  Tracery, developed by Kate Compton.

This prototype has been developed for the NarraScope Game Jam of 2020 with the theme, "Growth".

- Made by Jordy van Opstal & Marlène Delrive
